about.title: About Me
about.description: Industrial Engineer with a higher degree in Web Application Development. After solid experience in management and logistics, I decided to redirect my career towards web development. I consider myself a proactive and versatile person with skills in both design and programming.
about.skillsDescription: Currently specialized in frontend technologies such as React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Three.js, and GSAP Motion, along with CSS frameworks like Tailwind and Bootstrap. I also have backend experience with Node.js, PHP, and MySQL, and development tools like Vite, Webpack, Git, and GitHub.
about.objectives: My goal is to apply my knowledge in innovative projects, contribute to team growth, and continue learning continuously. I seek opportunities that allow me to combine my management experience with my technical skills in web development.

skills.description: A set of technologies and tools that I master to create exceptional web experiences.

experience.title: Academic and Professional Background
experience.description: My education and experience in web development
